morningBrief.headline: Fresh Snow on the Way
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 8" over the last week. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. Snow is in the cards for the next few days. Enough to freshen things up.

morningBrief.headline: Major System Approaching
morningBrief.body: 3" of new snow. Not a powder day, but definitely an upgrade. The weather models are locked in: 38" of snow heading our way. Holiday period means the mountain will be busy. Start early to beat the crowds.

morningBrief.headline: The Forecast Looks Loaded
morningBrief.body: The rundown: 172 trails open, 99 groomed. Snow Wind with temps around temps TBD. Big things coming. 29" in the forecast. Might be time to plan ahead. Peak season vibes today. Expect longer lift lines, especially late morning.

trends: Great week for snow - 30" in last 7 days

morningBrief.headline: Time to Call in Sick
morningBrief.body: 15" of fresh powder waiting. This is a powder emergency. Act accordingly. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. The weather models are locked in: 24" of snow heading our way.

morningBrief.headline: The Mountain Got a Touch-Up
morningBrief.body: 2" of fresh snow settled in overnight. Not a powder day, but an upgrade. Light snow possible in the forecast. Holiday period means the mountain will be busy. Start early to beat the crowds.

morningBrief.headline: A Little Sugar on Top
morningBrief.body: 1" fell while you were sleeping. The bumps are softer, groomers are primo. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.

morningBrief.body: The rundown: 62 trails open, 50 groomed. Cloudy with temps around temps TBD. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Snow showers in the forecast with a few inches expected. Conditions should improve.
